item.title: Hyderabad: Water Board to cut supply over non-payment of bills
item.description: Hyderabad: Water Board to cut supply over non-payment of bills HMWS&SB MD Dana Kishore instructed the officials to focus on the collection of dues from commercial and non-free water scheme connections.
